titles.title: Nashua River Wild and Scenic River Act of 2018
A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate segments of the Nashua, Squannacook, and Nissitissit Rivers as components of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
Nashua River Wild and Scenic River Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Nashua River Wild and Scenic River Act of 2018
This bill designates specified segments of the Nashua, Squannacook, and Nissitissit rivers in Massachusetts and New Hampshire as components of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System. The bill excludes from such designation certain areas near to the Ice House and Pepperell hydroelectric projects and the Hollingsworth and Vose dam.
